Method Detail

decode

public java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String path,
                               java.lang.String name)
Decrypt assumes the image being used is of type .png, extracts the hidden text from an image

Parameters:
path - The path (folder) containing the image to extract the message from
name - The name of the image to extract the message from
type - integer representing either basic or advanced encoding

encode

public boolean encode(java.lang.String path,
                      java.lang.String original,
                      java.lang.String ext1,
                      java.lang.String stegan,
                      java.lang.String message)
Encrypt an image with text, the output file will be of type .png

Parameters:
path - The path (folder) containing the image to modify
original - The name of the image to modify
ext1 - The extension type of the image to modify (jpg, png)
stegan - The output name of the file
message - The text to hide in the image
type - integer representing either basic or advanced encoding
